item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, you’ve reached the website of Spell 3 Limited, which is a software engineering consultancy owned by me - Romanas Sonkinas. Originally from Lithuania, I have spent most of my career in and around London, UK. Generally speaking, I am a Software Engineer. More specifically, I’ve spent most of my career in either the IoT or Cloud/SaaS world and know these things pretty well. I’ve also dabbled somewhat into Machine Learning, but don’t consider myself particularly technically competent in that field.

item.title: Contact
item.description: For unsolicited inquiries, please get in touch via LinkedIn.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
